title: montreal1
author: montreal1
content: I have a trezor that I bought in July 2015 directly from trezor for about .3 btcThey don't seem to use this packaging anymore. Does anybody know if it has value as a collector's item? thanks. also, please let me know if this post isn't appropriate for this section and I'll remove it.

comments.author: krogoth
comments.body: If it's a collectable item it is appropriate.  Especially if it were their first edition aluminum trezor one which are impossible to find

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Yes it is collectible, and I can say with 100% confidence that it is worth less than the .3 BTC you paid

comments.author: montreal1
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on November 26, 2022, 06:21:03 PMYes it is collectible, and I can say with 100% confidence that it is worth less than the .3 BTC you paid LOL idk why I included that, just thought it was funny to see when I found the email confirmation.I couldn't find much information on these so I was just curious. I should have just started with an auction. I'll delete this thread and probably auction it at some point.And thank you krogoth, unfortunately I don't think it's aluminum. Just a white one.
